betaling er på vej

Fakturanr. {{ invoice_number }} er solgt til Moneyflow I A/S for {{ invoice_amount }} kr. Et momspligtigt fakturasalgsgebyr på {{ fee_amount }} kr. er tilføjet.
Hvad skal min kunde gøre?
Din kunde betaler fakturaen som normalt, men til en ny bankkonto, der tilhører Moneyflow. De nye betalingsinstrukser er tilføjet på fakturaen. Moneyflow overtager en eventuel rykkerprocedure.
Hvad gør jeg, hvis der er en fejl på fakturaen?
Vi ved, at der kan ske fejl på fakturaer. Kontakt vores kundeservice, som vil hjælpe dig og fortælle om dine muligheder.

fields.subject: Dit første fakturasalg er gået igennem

fields.html_template:
Hej {{ signee_name }}.

Du har nu gennemført installationen for {{ company_name }} og kan begynde at få tidlige betalinger for dine fakturaer gennem Moneyflow.
Din Moneyflow konto
er nu klar til brug
Hej {{ signee_name }}.

Du har nu gennemført installationen for {{ company_name }} og kan begynde at få tidlige betalinger for dine fakturaer gennem Moneyflow.

Vedhæftet denne e-mail finder du hovedaftalen som du har underskrevet.

Du kan nu importere fakturakladder og vælge hvilke kvalificerede fakturaer, som du vil have tidlig betaling for.
Hvilke fakturaer kan jeg få betaling for med det samme?
For at du kan bruge tidlig betaling på en faktura skal disse forhold være opfyldt:
Virksomhed til virksomhed
Fakturaer sendt til dansk registrerede virksomheder. Vær opmærksom på at noter CVR nummeret på din kunde
Betalingsfrist
Fakturaens betalingsfrist er mellem 8 og 90 dage
Kunder med god historik
Du skal have handlet med dine kunder indenfor de seneste 12 måneder

Fakturabeløb
Det totale fakturabeløb er min. 1.000 kr.
*Andre faktorer kan medvirke at tidlig betaling ikke er mulig
Ofte stillede spørgsmål
Hvordan sælger jeg min første faktura?
Lav din faktura som du plejer og gem den som en kladde. Herefter går du till moneyflow.io/dinero og fortsætter fakturasalget der.
Hvornår modtager jeg pengene?
Du modtager pengene indefor 2 timer (hverdage, mellem 8 og 18)
Hvad betyder det for min kunde?
Din kunde modtager og betaler fakturaen som normalt, men benytter de nye bankoplysninger som fremgår af fakturaen.
Læs mere
Se mere om Moneyflow
Sådan får du betaling med det samme
Lær Moneyflow at kende
Hvordan kan jeg få hjælp?
Kontakt os nu
Start en chat
Skriv en mail
Ring til os på
+45 89 87 70 36
Privatlivs- og cookiepolitik | Forettningsbetingelser
Moneyflow er godkendt af Finanstilsynet
Moneyflow Group A/S | Langebrogade 4, 1411 København | CVR 39228327

Instant Payment
is on its way
Instant Payment has been used on invoice no. {{ invoice_number }} sent by {{ company_name }}.

We have sent {{ factoring_amount }} kr. to your bank account ending with {{ account_number }} and prepared the book keeping for you, which you just have to approve in e-conomic. You can expect payment within 2 hours (weekdays, between 8am and 6pm).

Attached to this email is the receipt for the sale.

fields.subject: Your invoice sale is completed

fields.html_template:
Hi {{ signee_name }}.

You have now completed the setup for {{ company_name }} and can get paid early for invoices through Moneyflow.
Your Moneyflow account
is now set up
Hi {{ signee_name }}.

You have now completed the setup for {{ company_name }} and can get paid early for invoices through Moneyflow.

Attached to this email is the signed Main Agreement.

You can now import invoice drafts and choose which eligible invoices you want early payment for.
Which invoices can I get paid out early?
In order to use early payment, the following criteria needs to be met:
Business to business
Invoices sent to registered businesses in Denmark. Make sure to fill in the CVR no. of your customer
Payment terms
Invoices with payment terms between 8 and 90 days
Customers with good history
You need to have traded with your customer during the last 12 months

Invoice amount
If the total invoice amount is above 1.000 kr.
* Other factors may deem Instant Payment inavailable
Frequently asked questions
How do I sell my first invoice?
Create your invoice as usual and save it as a draft. Then go to moneyflow.io/dinero and continue the invoice sale from there.
When do I receive the money?
You will recieve the money within 2 hours (weekdays, between 8am and 6pm)
How will this affect my customer?
Your customer receives and pays the invoice as usual, but uses the new bank information stated on the invoice.
Read more
Learn more about Moneyflow
How to get paid now
Get to know Moneyflow
How can I get help?
Reach out now
Start a chat
Send an email
Call us on
+45 89 87 70 36
Privacy and Cookie Policy | General Terms and Conditions
Moneyflow is registered by the Danish FSA
Moneyflow Group A/S | Langebrogade 4, 1411 Copenhagen | CVR 39228327
fields.subject: You can now get early payment for your invoices

fields.html_template:
Hi {{ signee_name }}.

You have now completed the setup of Instant Payment for {{ company_name }} in e-conomic and can get paid instantly for invoices through Moneyflow.
Instant payment
is now set up
Hi {{ signee_name }}.

You have now completed the setup of Instant Payment for {{ company_name }} in e-conomic and can get paid instantly for invoices through Moneyflow.

Attached to this email is the signed Main Agreement.

When creating and sending an invoice, you will now be able to turn on Instant Payment for that particular invoice.
Which invoices can I get paid out instantly?
In order to use Instant Payment, the following criteria needs to be met:
Business to business
Invoices sent to registered businesses in Denmark. Make sure to fill in the CVR no. of your customer
Payment terms
Invoices with payment terms between 8 and 90 days
Customers with good history
You need to have traded with your customer during the last 12 months

Invoice amount
If the total invoice amount is above 1.000 kr.
* Other factors may deem Instant Payment inavailable
Frequently asked questions
How do I sell my first invoice?
Create your invoice as usual and turn on Instant Payment on the invoice draft.
When do I receive the money?
You will recieve the money within 2 hours (weekdays, between 8am and 6pm)
How will this affect my customer?
Your customer receives and pays the invoice as usual, but uses the new bank information stated on the invoice.
Read more

Du har nu gennemført installationen af Straksindbetaling for {{ company_name }} i e-conomic og kan få betaling med det samme for fakturaer gennem Moneyflow.
Straksindbetaling er
nu installeret
Hej {{ signee_name }}.

Du har nu gennemført installationen af Straksindbetaling for {{ company_name }} i e-conomic og kan få betaling med det samme for fakturaer gennem Moneyflow.

Vedhæftet denne e-mail finder du hovedaftalen som du har underskrevet.

Når du laver og sender en faktura, har du nu mulighed for at aktivere Straksindbetaling for den specifikke faktura.
Hvilke fakturaer kan jeg få betaling for med det samme?
For at du kan bruge Straksindbetaling på en faktura skal disse forhold være opfyldt:
Virksomhed til virksomhed
Fakturaer sendt til dansk registrerede virksomheder. Vær opmærksom på at noter CVR nummeret på din kunde
Betalingsfrist
Fakturaens betalingsfrist er mellem 8 og 90 dage
Kunder med god historik
Du skal have handlet med dine kunder indenfor de seneste 12 måneder

Fakturabeløb
Det totale fakturabeløb er min. 1.000 kr.
*Andre faktorer kan medvirke at Straksindbetaling ikke er mulig
Ofte stillede spørgsmål
Hvordan sælger jeg min første faktura?
Lav din faktura som du plejer og aktiver Straksindbetaling på fakturakladden.
Hvornår modtager jeg pengene?
Du modtager pengene indefor 2 timer (hverdage, mellem 8 og 18)
Hvad betyder det for min kunde?
Din kunde modtager og betaler fakturaen som normalt, men benytter de nye bankoplysninger som fremgår af fakturaen.

fields.html_template:
Instant Payment has been used on invoice no. {{ invoice_number }} sent by {{ company_name }}.
Your first Instant Payment
is on its way
Instant Payment has been used on invoice no. {{ invoice_number }} sent by {{ company_name }}.

We have sent {{ factoring_amount }} kr. to your bank account ending with {{ account_number }} and prepared the book keeping for you, which you just have to approve in e-conomic. You can expect payment within 2 hours (weekdays, between 8am and 6pm).

Attached to this email is the receipt for the sale.
Receipt for Instant Payment
Fee{{ fee_amount }} kr.
VAT (25%){{ vat_amount }} kr.
Total amount{{ total_fee_amount }} kr.
Invoice no. {{ invoice_number }} was bought by Moneyflow I A/S for {{ invoice_amount }} kr. An invoice sale fee of {{ fee_amount }} kr. is added, which is subject to 25% VAT.
What does my customer need to do?
Your customer pays the invoice as usual, but to a new bank account connected to Moneyflow. The new payment instructions are added to the invoice. Moneyflow will take care of collecting the payment.
What do I do if there is a mistake on the invoice
We know honest mistakes happen. In such an event, please contact our customer support, who will guide you through your options.
How was the experience?
We would love to hear from you. Press a star to leave a review.
How can I get help?
Reach out now

Send an email
Call us on
+45 89 87 70 36
Privacy and Cookie Policy | General Terms and Conditions
